mapper.insert: insert into f_merchant_type(m_type, m_office_time, m_closing_time, m_mode, m_shipping_information, m_notice) values (#{fMerchantType.mType},#{fMerchantType.mOfficeTime},#{fMerchantType.mClosingTime}, #{fMerchantType.mMode},#{fMerchantType.mShippingInformation},#{fMerchantType.mNotice});
